attributes.action: permit the permitted earnings of JSA (and other benefits) recipients to be accrued
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This measure would allow the jobseekers to take short term and low paid work without signing off.  The weekly permitted earnings allowance  would be accrued for the period of unemployment (ie weekly sumX weeks of unemployment). TThis would then form the amount that such a person could receive before loss of benfit.  By this measure the jobseeker would be enabled to take very short term work - to the advantage of all, without the problems caused by signing on and off
